channel.title: RuneStuff V.1 {RST} New P-Server+Client+Community, Now Recruiting
channel.description:
[img]http://img115.imageshack.us/img115/2546/cooltext72430415sy2.jpg[/img]
Welcome to the RuneStuff development topic. We are recruiting staff for a brand new server and online community, wich will be released in a PM.
Anyone with high specifications can join. Im updating pictures of the forums, but im almost done.
We're Currently Recruiting:
[b]ServerCoders: - - -
ClientCoders: - - - - -
ForumStaff(WillBeDeterminedLater) - - - -[/b]
[i]I am Co-Leader of the devoplopment, Please talk to "SLITTER.8" For any issues, regarding the devolopment. Heres how to join! [/i]
[code][b]WhatRoleWouldYouLike:[/b] [b]AreYouDedicated:[/b] [b]HowMuchWillYouBeOnline:[/b] [b]WhatSpotDoYouWant:[/b] [b]HowMuchYouWillDoToEnrichTheCommunity:[/b][/code]
ForumPics: Updating~~1Sec.
ServerPics: NoneAsOfYet~~

item.title: RuneStuff V.1 {RST} New P-Server+Client+Community, Now Recruiting

item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

Accepted as HEAD SERVER CODER,
Welcome to the team Zez.

Also, please DO NOT Use Hamachi.
